text:
I am writing to commend Risky from this Timberland IMM outlet for his outstanding customer service. During my today  visit, Risky displayed an exceptional level of professionalism, attentiveness, and product knowledge, making my shopping experience truly enjoyable.

He was not only helpful in recommending the right products based on my family needs but also demonstrated patience and enthusiasm, ensuring we found exactly what we was looking for. His friendly and approachable demeanor created a welcoming atmosphere, which reflects positively on Timberland’s commitment to excellent service.

Risky’s dedication and positive attitude make him a valuable asset to your team. I sincerely appreciate his efforts and hope that his commitment to customer satisfaction is recognized and celebrated.

Thank you for fostering such a great customer experience, and I look forward to visiting your store again soon.

Went shoe shopping at timberland with my husband and was pleased with our customer service associate, Nazarul. He was busy but despite it all, we were attended with patience and professionalism. Overall, we are happy with our purchase and experience!

The staff and management here are very professional and helpful. Good prices and promos too.
'Above and beyond' level of service. Thank you, I will definitely come back again.
Great service. Especially from Tommy who helped me among others. No effort to go back every time to get the right size. In short, superb service and customer-friendly.
Similar experience like many reviewers. Rude and incompetent staff. No sympathy for these retail staff losing their pathetic jobs.
